Collaboration issues: If the writer is working with other musicians or producers, there may be disagreements about the direction of the song or creative differences.
Production challenges: The production process can be complex and time-consuming, with various technical issues that may arise.
Marketing and promotion: Once the song is completed, it may be difficult to effectively market and promote it to reach the target audience.
Copyright and ownership: If the song samples or references other works, there may be issues with copyright and ownership rights.
Audience reception: Even if the song is well-produced and marketed, there is no guarantee that it will be well-received by the target audience.
